root: ^Please, Claye. We're getting you your food.

Vulnerable: ^I used to live on the streets. It was a privilege if we got to eat once during the week. You'll survive.
Intellectual: ^If you think about it, ideas are to the mind what food is to the body.
Continue: ^Okay Claye, it's going to be okay. I brought you a rock.
^Um, hey, Tom. Would you be able to go get Claye his food from the kitchen as I take care of him?
